item.title: About me
item.author: aveek.s98@gmail.com (Aveek Saha)
item.description: I’m a Computer Science student and I am passionate about Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, the Web, and Application development. I also work on IoT projects and I’m handy with microcontrollers.I love swimming and drawing as well. Be sure to check out some of my artwork.
